name: Touhou(東方) Character Cards
description:
A character card matchmaking game based on the minigame from Tales of Berseria with characters from Touhou Project

Controls

Use your mouse to select the card you want to use. Left-click to select and Rigth-click to unselect. Press the Esc key to return to the main menu.

NOTE: You don't have to drag the cards, they'll act automatically when selected

Character Artworks from dairi. 

Pixiv account: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/4920496
